thread.title: TV | Hunted

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: TV | Hunted
text: Channel 4's real-life thriller where 14 people go on the run from a team of expert hunters continues as two of the hunted make their way along canal towpaths for over 100 miles to hide out in a caravan in Wales and come up with an ingenious way of contacting their loved ones while another in the fourth episode of this gripping series.
